content:
* Appraiser should be aware of FHA's well/septic distance requirements, comment on distances if discernible, otherwise state not discernible.
* Sketches to include dimensions of home, patios, porches, garages, breezeways, outbuildings, basements, and offsets (pools), state "covered" or "uncovered", and indicate any other attachments/outbuildings.

FHA Report Sketch Requirements: comment on well/septic distances (if discernible), include home/outbuilding dimensions, state roof status, indicate attachments/outbuildings.
